metadata.synopsis: Avatar Shadowheart meets with her parents once again, who have been imprisoned for decades. A vision of Shar appears and demands Shadowheart sacrifice her parents.Note: there are two major tracks in this scene - if SH comes to it as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess's command, or as someone who has turned from Shar and is coming to rescue her parents.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to grotto with shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Beat Viconia4. Talk to Viconia5. Go to Chamber of Loss6. Talk to Parents

100.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
100.text: It can't be. Another vile trick -
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart approaches two upright discs upon which an elf man and human woman are restrained to each. (This should be reminiscent of the figure SH glimpsed in Shar's symbol during her vision after killing Nightsong). The elf man lifts his head to see Shadowheart and reacts with disbelief. His disc flares. He breaks off with a cry of pain.

99.context: CinematicNodeContext: - both the prisoners suddenly writhe in pain against their restraints. Shadowheart glances down at her right hand in surprise.

17.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: - both the prisoners suddenly writhe in pain against their restraints. Shadowheart glances down at her right hand in surprise.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: That was me. I did that. How...?
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The chamber seems to grow darker suddenly. Shadowheart sees a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents, in the same pose that the huge Shar statue at the centre of her temple in act 2 took (left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left) Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

195.text: This was my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
195.context: CinematicNodeContext: The chamber seems to grow darker suddenly. Shadowheart sees a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents, in the same pose that the huge Shar statue at the centre of her temple in act 2 took (left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left) Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

56.text: This was my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

162.speaker: Shar
162.text: This was my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
162.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

4.text: Their names are Arnell Hallowleaf, and his wife, Emmeline.
4.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

146.speaker: Shar
146.text: Their names are Arnell Hallowleaf, and his wife, Emmeline.
146.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

106.speaker: Shar
106.text: Once, they were among the most fanatical of my sister Selûne's followers, but for years they have been here, resisting my embrace.
106.context: NodeContext: All-powerful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

192.speaker: Shar
192.text: Just as I wished them to.
192.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

159.speaker: Shar
159.text: Their wrongheaded resolve allowed me to shape you. But I need not tell you - I can show you. It is time to remember. Time to remember everything.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Moonmaiden? Who the hells are you two?
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. 207.speaker: Shar
207.text: They are part of my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
207.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. 135.text: As for their names, this is Arnell Hallowleaf, and his wife, Emmeline.
135.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. 73.text: This can't be... Are they my parents? What have you done to them?
73.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. 124.speaker: Shadowheart
124.text: This can't be... Are they my parents? What have you done to them?
124.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

101.speaker: Shar
101.text: We, Shadowheart. We did this to them together. My power, and your will.
101.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: I don't believe it. Tell me it's not real, my Lady. Tell me it's a test.
3.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

92.speaker: Shar
92.text: It is a test, but they are also who they appear to be - your parents. Your flesh and blood. Your sacrifice to make.
92.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

58.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
58.text: Jenevelle? Jen? Is that you? Why, you look so tall...
58.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

117.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
117.text: It's not her, Emm. It's just another trick. Another way to hurt us.
117.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

120.speaker: Shadowheart
120.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

125.speaker: Shar
125.text: Jenevelle is no more. She never left those dark woods - it was Shadowheart who emerged. This woman gave birth to you, but I made you. I am your Mother.
125.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

204.speaker: Shar
204.text: A sacrifice is not a sacrifice if it has no meaning. This is the final step - snuff out the last embers of your old life, so that you can finally be who you were meant to be.
204.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

45.speaker: Shar
45.text: Kill them, for me. Then I will take the memories away from you again. Loss will heal you, and you will be my right hand, at last.
45.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.context: NodeContext: Firm. The soothing tones from before are quickly fading. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

31.speaker: Shar
31.context: NodeContext: Firm. The soothing tones from before are quickly fading. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

114.speaker: Shar
114.text: Do you remember your training, child? I know you do. All the times you stood in this room, wondering why this pair seemed so familiar. All the times you honed your skills on them.
114.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

25.speaker: Shar
25.text: They remember everything. The pain. The pleading. Their torturer, wearing their daughter's face. End their nightmare. Give them peace.
25.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

137.speaker: Shadowheart
137.text: Do as you are commanded to. End their suffering.
137.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

138.speaker: Shadowheart
138.text: No. I'm leaving this place. I'm leaving you. And I'm taking my parents with me.
138.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

191.speaker: Shar
191.text: So much was done to mould you, and still you turn your back on me, for two strangers that you share blood with?
191.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

83.speaker: Shar
83.text: Go then, leave - the dark will still be waiting. But keep some memories as a parting gift.
83.context: NodeContext: Anger rising as she's being opening defied. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

214.speaker: Shar
214.text: You learned so much, applying your skills to these two. Now you can remember it all, whenever you look upon their faces.
214.context: NodeContext: Bitter, angry. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

69.speaker: Shar
69.text: You showed great promise, but no more. When the darkness finally comes for you again, it will not be my welcoming embrace - it will be a hungry maw, then nothing. Farewell.
69.context: NodeContext: Bitter, angry. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

153.text: You did it, Jen. You found your way home.
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's visage fades away. The dark aura in the chamber of loss recedes. Shadowheart's parents are both freed from their soul cage bonds.

88.text: You did it, Jen. You found your way home.
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

200.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
200.text: You did it, Jen. You found your way home.
200.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

80.speaker: Shadowheart
80.text: I... I hurt you both. So much. Gods forgive me...
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

39.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
39.text: There is nothing to forgive. You did what was necessary. To survive.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

140.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
140.text: And I have my daughter back. What more could a mother want?
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

190.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

163.speaker: Shadowheart
163.text: I'm getting you out of here. There's a place where you'll be safe.

65.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
65.text: Just let us know where to go - we'll find our way.

172.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
172.text: The Moonmaiden will guide us. Just as she guided you.

206.speaker: Shadowheart
206.text: I thought you were my goddess... but you're just a monster.
206.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

196.speaker: Shar
196.text: I am neither. I am nothing. I am the empty room. The dreamless sleep. The shadow's shadow. There was no pain before my sister set the sun aflame. Now you exist to suffer, until you find your way back to my embrace.
196.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

177.speaker: Shadowheart
177.text: I shall carry out your will, my Lady.
177.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

55.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
55.text: Whatever happens, we love you all the same.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

44.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
44.text: We never stopped. Thank you, Moonmaiden. You let me see my Jenevelle, my baby girl, one last time.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

208.speaker: Shadowheart
208.text: Don't call me that. My name is Shadowheart.
208.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

149.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
149.text: You are just lost, Jenevelle. Selûne will show you the way home, in time -

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Unleash Lady Shar's power. Sacrifice them.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

171.text: It is done. And done well. They are with me now, in my endless dark. And from them, you can draw endless power.
171.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

59.text: It is done. And done well. They are with me now, in my endless dark. And from them, you can draw endless power.
59.context: NodeContext: Proud, soothing. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

89.speaker: Shar
89.text: It is done. And done well. They are with me now, in my endless dark. And from them, you can draw endless power.
89.context: NodeContext: Proud, soothing. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

122.speaker: Shadowheart
122.text: I still remember. Everything I did to them.
122.context: NodeContext: Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

36.speaker: Shar
36.text: No longer. Forget. Forget and rise.
36.context: NodeContext: Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

133.text: What happened? I remember entering this chamber, then... nothing.
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart blinks in confusion, glancing around. She rises back to her feet.

181.text: What happened? I remember entering this chamber, then... nothing.
181.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

183.speaker: Shadowheart
183.text: What happened? I remember entering this chamber, then... nothing.
183.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

78.speaker: Shadowheart
78.text: Is it over? Have I proven myself, Lady Shar?
78.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

178.speaker: Shar
178.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

152.speaker: Shar
152.text: You did all that I asked of you. You made one last sacrifice in my name, now this place is yours to command, and my power is yours to wield, my Chosen.
152.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

158.speaker: Shadowheart
158.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

16.speaker: Shar
16.text: They are nothing. Empty husks. Remnants of your sacrifice in my name.
16.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

13.speaker: Shar
13.text: Now this place is yours to command, and my power is yours to wield, my Chosen.
13.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

132.speaker: Shar
132.text: Soon a great battle will commence in this city - and you shall lead my forces to victory. Now go forth.
132.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's visage fades away. The dark aura in the chamber of loss recedes.

147.speaker: Shadowheart
147.text: What am I to do now?
147.context: NodeContext: Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

126.speaker: Shar
126.text: First you must forget. The sacrifice has been made. Surrender all memories of these two to my embrace.
126.context: NodeContext: Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

202.speaker: Shadowheart
202.text: If this is a test, what must I do?

113.speaker: Shadowheart
113.text: That was me... I hurt them. How?
113.context: NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

34.speaker: Shar
34.text: Their wrongheaded resolve allowed me to shape you - their daughter. Time to remember.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart winces as a flood of memories are restored to her.NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

97.speaker: Shadowheart
97.text: They're... they're my parents? What have you done to them?
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart winces as a flood of memories are restored to her.NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

74.context: NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

139.speaker: Shadowheart
139.text: I still remember. Who they were. What I did to them...
139.context: NodeContext: dazed, shocked. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: I'm here to get you out of this place.
15.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

136.speaker: Shadowheart
136.text: You're a monster, not a goddess.
136.context: NodeContext: Angry, defiant. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

189.speaker: Shadowheart
189.text: The hells with this. I'm here to save you.
189.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: No, I'm not giving up on you. We can weather whatever Shar has in store for us, together.
2.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

186.speaker: Shadowheart
186.text: First I need to get you out of these restraints. Then find your way to our camp - you'll be safe there.
186.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

212.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
212.text: It can't be. Another vile trick...
212.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart approaches two upright discs upon which an elf man and human woman are restrained to each. (This should be reminiscent of the figure SH glimpsed in Shar's symbol during her vision after killing Nightsong). The elf man lifts his head to see Shadowheart and reacts with disbelief. His disc flares. He breaks off with a cry of pain.

205.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
205.text: No... there is no trick. It's her. Jenevelle. Jen. Our little girl.
205.context: CinematicNodeContext: The chamber seems to grow darker suddenly. Shadowheart sees a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents, in the same pose that the huge Shar statue at the centre of her temple in act 2 took (left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left) Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

42.text: We made it, Emm. She came back for us. It's over.

213.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart doubles over in pain as her incurable wound flares intensely. Her parents also writhe in agony. Finally it abates and Shadowheart stands. Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

38.speaker: Shar
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart doubles over in pain as her incurable wound flares intensely. Her parents also writhe in agony. Finally it abates and Shadowheart stands. Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. 169.text: You see? It matters not if you raze this place, if you slay every one of your brothers and sisters. That was never where my power resided.
169.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

96.speaker: Shar
96.text: You see? It matters not if you raze this place, if you slay every one of your brothers and sisters. That was never where my power resided.
96.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

144.speaker: Shar
144.text: Every time you try to step away from me, every time you try to reach for Selûne, my hold on you bites deeper. If you had learned, if you had obeyed, there would be no pain. But you struggle on. You make things worse for yourself. And for them.
144.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

76.speaker: Shadowheart
76.text: You're a monster, not a goddess.
76.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

127.speaker: Shar
127.text: I am neither. I am nothing. I am the empty room. The dreamless sleep. The shadow's shadow. There was no pain before my sister set the sun aflame. Now you exist to suffer, until you find your way back to my embrace.
127.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

161.speaker: Shadowheart
161.text: I don't care - I've found my parents. I've won.
161.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

51.speaker: Shar
51.text: Won? Your victory is but a guttering candle in the dark. Temporary. Inconsequential.
51.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

10.speaker: Shar
10.text: Ask your sire - he knows. You are all bound to each other. And to me.
10.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

72.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
72.text: It's true. We are still bound to you. You cannot both free us and free yourself from her curse.
72.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

131.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
131.text: The Moonmaiden needs you more than she needs us. You are the future - you must return to the fold. We are the past. And our duty is almost done.
131.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

112.speaker: Shar
112.text: Eloquently put. His mind stood up well to his time here. The same cannot be said for your mother - such brief, fragile lives humans lead.
112.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

168.speaker: Shar
168.text: This is my final lesson. I leave you now, to dwell on your mistakes and make your choice. End their suffering and free yourself. Or prolong the pain, together.
168.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

166.text: *Shar's parting words make your flesh crawl. You fear that you know all-too-well what choice she spoke of, though you wish it wasn't so.*
166.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's silhouette melts away and the dark Shadowfell aura fades. The room is as it was before.

52.text: *Shar's parting words make your flesh crawl. You fear that you know all-too-well what choice she spoke of, though you wish it wasn't so.*
52.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *Shar's parting words make your flesh crawl. You fear that you know all-too-well what choice she spoke of, though you wish it wasn't so.*
64.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *Your chance at freedom from Shar's curse, and your parents' very lives - they are entwined. One cannot be claimed without the loss of another.*
18.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

141.speaker: Shadowheart
141.text: Did she mean what I think she did...?
141.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

165.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
165.text: Shar is a spiteful creature. She will never admit defeat - not until she has stolen one last thing from you. Your future must not be her final prize. Not after all we have endured to see you again.

11.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
11.text: You'll never be entirely free of her torments as long as we draw breath. You must end this - give us Selûne's mercy.

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: The hells with this. I'm here to save you.
61.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

60.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
60.text: And you did. You found us.

145.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
145.text: All these years, that dream kept us going, that you would break free. No matter what they made you do to us, we knew you were still in there.

150.speaker: Shadowheart
150.text: I'm not harming you. I can't.
150.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

50.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
50.text: Not harming us - freeing us. The dream that you'd find your way back to us was the only thing that kept us going, all these years.
50.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

26.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
26.text: Now you're here, and we can rest.
26.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

119.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
119.text: I knew the dark woods wouldn't frighten you. You were always such a brave girl.
119.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

185.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
185.text: She was. And still is. You've saved us. Now save yourself. You'll be out of Shar's reach, and we'll be at peace.
185.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: But I only just found you again.
19.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

209.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
209.text: We'll still be with you. By the Moonmaiden's grace, we'll never be far. Please, Jenevelle.

118.speaker: Shadowheart
118.text: Are you sure this is what you want?
118.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

98.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
98.text: It is what we need, all of us. You were meant to be a guiding light for Selûne's faithful, but they robbed you from us. Now that can be righted, and we can rest.
98.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

175.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
175.text: Help us, Jen. I can let go, now I've seen your face again.
175.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

43.text: *Moon motes. They bring Selûne's light to dark places and offer guidance to those in need. Your parents still watch over you.*
43.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

79.text: *Moon motes. They bring Selûne's light to dark places and offer guidance to those in need. Your parents still watch over you.*

104.speaker: Narrator
104.text: *Moon motes. They bring Selûne's light to dark places and offer guidance to those in need. Your parents still watch over you.*
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: The moon motes flit away out of frame, as if heading for the exit.

130.speaker: Narrator
130.text: *And they wish for you to leave this place behind.*
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: The moon motes flit away out of frame, as if heading for the exit.

198.speaker: Shadowheart
198.text: Call on Selûne's power to end their suffering.
198.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing her husband, but looking at SH with a studying, reverential expression

211.speaker: Shadowheart
211.text: No, I'm not giving up on you. We can weather whatever Shar has in store for us, together.
211.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing her husband, but looking at SH with a studying, reverential expression

84.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
84.text: No, Jenevelle, you mustn't. We'll be a burden to you -
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing her husband, but looking at SH with a studying, reverential expression

194.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
194.text: Hush, Arnell. The Moonmaiden guides her, don't you see?
194.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing her husband, but looking at SH with a studying, reverential expression

197.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
197.text: Jen wants her family. Jen shall have her family. How can we help, dear?
197.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away... the glow fades. SH's parents are now free of their restraints, weak on their feet. Shadowheart embraces them gently.

180.speaker: Shadowheart
180.text: Use Selûne's power to break their bindings.
180.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away... the glow fades. SH's parents are now free of their restraints, weak on their feet. Shadowheart embraces them gently.

86.speaker: Shadowheart
86.text: First I need to get you out of these restraints. Then find your way to our camp - you'll be safe there.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away... the glow fades. SH's parents are now free of their restraints, weak on their feet. Shadowheart embraces them gently.

68.text: We will find the way from here. Do what you need to, Jenevelle.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away... the glow fades. SH's parents are now free of their restraints, weak on their feet. Shadowheart embraces them gently.

170.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
170.text: We will find the way from here. Do what you need to, Jenevelle.

40.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
40.text: We will see you soon, with the Moonmaiden's guidance.

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: Ignore Shar. Turn to free your parents.
33.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar)

129.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
129.text: You cannot. We are still bound to you. You cannot both free us and free yourself from her curse.
129.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar)
